openconnector
Class Plan

java.lang.Object
  openconnector.Plan

public class Plan
extends java.lang.Object

A model to represent a set of provisioning requests for a connector. The connector can treat the entire plan as one "transaction" or it can break up the plan into several independent transactions. The plan is expected to be annotated with Result objects to convey what was done.

Structurally, a plan consists of a set of Requests and a Request consists of a set of Items. A request usually defines an operation to be performed on a particular user account and an item usually corresponds to an attribute or permission on that account.
